name: Construction File Creation
description: Generates a construction file for performing a CRISPR-mediated gene knockout in an insect species. It integrates organism-specific toolkit selection and gRNA design.

inputs.name: organism_name
inputs.description: The name of the insect species for which the construction file is being created.

inputs.name: gene_sequence
inputs.description: The DNA sequence of the target gene to be knocked out.

outputs.description: A detailed construction file containing steps for CRISPR-mediated gene knockout, including toolkit selection, gRNA design, and transformation protocols.
